conversation.speaker: USER
conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a biopic movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text: For a biopic, I'd highly recommend "A Beautiful Mind" and "Bohemian Rhapsody". The former delves into the life of a Nobel laureate battling schizophrenia, while the latter tells the story of the legendary rock band Queen, focusing on their iconic frontman Freddie Mercury. Both movies offer powerful performances and captivating narratives that will keep you engaged. Enjoy your movie time!
